symptoms.name: Flu-like illness
symptoms.pattern: Common in pulmonary blastomycosis, may be misdiagnosed as tuberculosis

symptoms.name: Skeletal involvement symptoms
symptoms.pattern: Less common, part of extrapulmonary blastomycosis

symptoms.name: Urogenital involvement symptoms
symptoms.pattern: Less common, part of extrapulmonary blastomycosis

symptoms.name: Central nervous system involvement symptoms
symptoms.pattern: Less common, part of extrapulmonary blastomycosis

risk_factors: Exposure to soil, especially moist and acidic soil near waterways
Recreational activities involving contact with soil
